title: House for sale in Battaramulla
details:
RAJAMALWATTA ROAD - Only 20m to the Main Road

A house you would love to call it a home for your family. Call us to inspect this beautiful property now!


This is a Two Storied House

Land Extent: 20 Perches

Sqft: 3800 approx


Offered for the first time in the market to suit a local business couple, young family or an expat wanting to re-establish themselves back to Sri Lanka. A very good investment too.


Property Features:

5 bedrooms (Large rooms, a/c in 3 rooms)

4 bathrooms in all

Large sitting room

Separate TV lounge

Kitchen with Pantry

Solar hot water to bathrooms and pantry.

Parking for 4 vehicles

The property opens into a garden in front and also holds a large beautifully landscaped garden in the back. The separate dining area opens to an inner court yard of greenery and art.



Additional Details:

Italian tiles used for the floor area

Wooden Ceilings

Wooden window frames

Domestic quarters and space to have a separate wet kitchen, if required

CCTV

Roller Shutter

Price: 75 Million or the Highest Offer
